entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit support. My name is Automated Assistant. How can I help you today?
I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse. I'm not happy with it.
Okay, I understand. I can certainly help you with a return. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order... Okay, I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on October 26th. Today is November 10th. What seems to be the issue?
It's just not working the way I expected. The heart rate tracking is inaccurate. It’s supposed to be a high-tech smart watch, but my old fitness tracker did a better job. I want to return it now!

I understand your frustration. Our standard return policy is 90 days. Since you’re well within that timeframe, processing a return for your VeloBand Pulse shouldn’t be a problem. I apologize that the VeloBand Pulse hasn't met your expectations. Let me go ahead and start the return process for you.
Ninety days? Seriously? I thought I was stuck with it! Are you sure? I read something about a much shorter window.

Yes, absolutely. You have 90 days from the date of purchase to return any items. There are some exceptions, but the VeloBand Pulse falls under our standard return policy. Let’s get this return set up. To confirm, you'd like to return the VeloBand Pulse for a full refund, correct?
Yes! A full refund. Finally, some good news. This whole thing has been a hassle.

Okay, I've initiated the return. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within 24 hours. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, if possible, attach the label, and drop it off at your nearest shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, your refund will be processed, and it should reflect in your account within 7-10 business days. You will receive updates as your refund is processed.
Okay, that sounds great. So I don't need to speak to a manager or anything? Just print the label and send it back?
That's correct. You do not need to speak with a manager. The 90 days gives you plenty of time to decide. Just print the label and send it back. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you so much for your help! I was really worried I was outside the return policy, because I thought it was only 10 days. This is a relief.
You're very welcome! I'm glad I could help. We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Have a great day!
